title: Interest after Judgment - do I need to file CCP 685.050 before listing interest on my Writ of Execution?
question: I'm filing and EJ-130. I've calculated my interest at 10% annual which totals $2.04 per day.
answers: Yes, you would need to file a declaration pursuant to CCP Section 685.050. Unfortunately, there is no form. It's just a declaration, regarding how you calculated the interest you are requesting, that you would put on legal pleading paper (e.g., caption at top, 28 lines, etc.). Hope this helps.
